Description: UVM sequencer for REGBUS protocol implementation

regbus_sequencer
uvm_sequencer​#(regbus_seq_item,regbus_seq_item)
regbus_sequencer

UVM sequencer for REGBUS protocol implementation

This sequencer manages the generation of REGBUS sequence items and coordinates between sequences and the driver. It provides the interface for sequences to generate REGBUS transactions in a controlled manner.

Inherits: uvm_sequencer#(regbus_seq_item,regbus_seq_item)
